creator: gedev
descriptionHtml:
“Flags of the World 2” is a quiz game (trivia) that teaches the flags, capitals, maps, continents and currencies of all world countries in the most fun way possible. You will always remember flags, capital cities and all other things you learned with this game. There are 4 Multiplayer modes: Flags, Capital Cities, Maps and Continents. You can play Multiplayer games with people who are from all over the world. Also, you can play with your friends!

There are 240 flags, 240 capital cities, 5 single player game types and 15 levels. It gets harder progressively in this flags quiz game.

Every level has 20 flags, 20 capital cities, 20 maps, 20 continents or 20 currencies and you have 20 seconds to match the flag or country for each question. If you choose a wrong flag, you will see the name of that flag or country.

You will also learn details like capitals, currencies, populations and areas while guessing a flag or a country, every question.

You can play Maps mode. You can guess country shape or location on map of each country.

You have a unique progress for each game type and each language in Single player modes. Also, there is a leaderboard for each language. Earn XP and reach the top of the list.

There are 4 Multiplayer modes: Flags, Capital Cities, Maps and Continents. You can earn gold and points (P) by winning games.

You can play Multiplayer games and join the tournament. When you reach the top 10 of the tournament list, you win prizes. Tournaments last 48 hours. When the tournament finishes, new tournament starts.

You have gold in the game that you can spend to use lifelines, own avatars and themes and enter challenge modes. When you have a few gold, you can play multiplayer games, buy gold or earn gold by watching ad.

You have 2 types of lifelines: 50:50 chance and double answer chance. You can use each of them spending golds in single player modes or multiplayer matches.

With our unique World Map, you can learn the locations and country shapes of all countries.

List the flags by levels (according to difficulty) in Study section. You may study all flags and names, capitals, populations, areas or currencies of countries with our functional flashcards at every level.

You can use Country List in Study section. You can sort countries by levels, continents or A to Z.

With our unique Search section, you can search for a country. You may study all flags and names, capitals, populations, areas or currencies of countries.

You can guess the country name from 4 flags or the flag from 4 countries. You can guess the country flag of given capital city name. No confusing mechanics. Simple and modern design.

You will feel like you are competing with yourself. Additionally there is a leaderboard of players around the world. Try more and put your name in Top 100 List.

You will also compete with other players in multiplayer mode. There is a leaderboard of multiplayer players around the world. Try hard and put your name in Multiplayer Top 100 List.

Don’t forget! You will learn all the flags by finishing all the levels with 3 hearts in 2 modes.

With a wide range of languages, learn in your native language or any other desired language.

You can use our fun and educational app “Flags of The World Quiz 2” in 29 different languages: English, Turkish, French, Spanish, Russian, German, Portuguese, Polish, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Indonesian, Danish, Norwegian, Arabic, Czech, Persian, Romanian, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Finnish, Korean, Japanese, Bulgarian, Azerbaijani, Hebrew, Serbian, Georgian, Chinese.

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gedevapps/
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/gedevapps
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gedevapps/
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFPDgs61ls5dCHcGXxzUrqg

You will always remember flags, capital cities and all other things you learned with this game. There are 2 Multiplayer modes: Flags and Geo Mix. You can play Multiplayer games with people who are from all over the world. Also, you can play with your friends!

There are 240 flags, 240 capital cities, 5 single player game types and 15 levels. It gets harder progressively in this flags quiz game.

Every level has 20 flags, 20 capital cities, 20 maps, 20 continents or 20 currencies and you have 20 seconds to match the flag or country for each question. If you choose a wrong flag, you will see the name of that flag or country.

You will also learn details like capitals, currencies, populations and areas while guessing a flag or a country, every question.

You can play Maps mode. You can guess country shape or location on map of each country.

You have a unique progress for each game type and each language in Single player modes. Also, there is a leaderboard for each language. Earn XP and reach the top of the list.

There are 4 Multiplayer modes: Flags, Capital Cities, Maps and Continents. You can earn gold and points (P) by winning games.

You can play Multiplayer games and join the tournament. When you reach the top 10 of the tournament list, you win prizes. Tournaments last 48 hours. When the tournament finishes, new tournament starts.

You have gold in the game that you can spend to use lifelines, own avatars and themes and enter challenge modes. When you have a few gold, you can play multiplayer games, buy gold or earn gold by watching ad.

You have 2 types of lifelines: 50:50 chance and double answer chance. You can use each of them spending golds in single player modes or multiplayer matches.

With our unique World Map, you can learn the locations and country shapes of all countries.

List the flags by levels (according to difficulty) in Study section. You may study all flags and names, capitals, populations, areas or currencies of countries with our functional flashcards at every level.

You can use Country List in Study section. You can sort countries by levels, continents or A to Z.

With our unique Search section, you can search for a country. You may study all flags and names, capitals, populations, areas or currencies of countries.

You can guess the country name from 4 flags or the flag from 4 countries. You can guess the country flag of given capital city name. No confusing mechanics. Simple and modern design.

You will feel like you are competing with yourself. Additionally there is a leaderboard of players around the world. Try more and put your name in Top 100 List.

You will also compete with other players in multiplayer mode. There is a leaderboard of multiplayer players around the world. Try hard and put your name in Multiplayer Top 100 List.

Don’t forget! You will learn all the flags by finishing all the levels with 3 hearts in 2 modes.

With a wide range of languages, learn in your native language or any other desired language.

You can use our fun and educational app “Flags of The World Quiz 2” in 29 different languages: English, Turkish, French, Spanish, Russian, German, Portuguese, Polish, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Indonesian, Danish, Norwegian, Arabic, Czech, Persian, Romanian, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Finnish, Korean, Japanese, Bulgarian, Azerbaijani, Hebrew, Serbian, Georgian, Chinese.

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gedevapps/
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/gedevapps
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gedevapps/
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFPDgs61ls5dCHcGXxzUrqg

title: Flags of the World 2: Map - Geography Quiz

container.value: Merkez Mah. Abide-i Hürriyet Cad. Blackout İş Merkezi No:211/64 Şişli/İstanbul Türkiye

creator: gedev
descriptionHtml:
“Flags of the World 2” is a quiz game (trivia) that teaches the flags, capitals, maps, continents and currencies of all world countries in the most fun way possible. You will always remember flags, capital cities and all other things you learned with this game. There are 2 Multiplayer modes: Flags and Geo Mix. You can play Multiplayer games with people who are from all over the world. Also, you can play with your friends!

There are 240 flags, 240 capital cities, 5 single player game types and 15 levels. It gets harder progressively in this flags quiz game.

Every level has 20 flags, 20 capital cities, 20 maps, 20 continents or 20 currencies and you have 20 seconds to match the flag or country/state for each question. If you choose a wrong flag, you will see the name of that flag or country/state.

You will also learn details like capitals, currencies, populations and areas while guessing a flag or a country/state, every question.

You can play Maps mode. You can guess country shape or location on map of each country/state.

You have a unique progress for each game type and each language in Single player modes. Also, there is a leaderboard for each language. Earn XP and reach the top of the list.

There are 4 Multiplayer modes: Flags, Capital Cities, Maps and Continents. You can earn gold and points (P) by winning games.

You can play Multiplayer games and join the tournament. When you reach the top 10 of the tournament list, you win prizes. Tournaments last 48 hours. When the tournament finishes, new tournament starts.

You have gold in the game that you can spend to use lifelines, own avatars and themes and enter challenge modes. When you have a few gold, you can play multiplayer games, buy gold or earn gold by watching ad.

You have 2 types of lifelines: 50:50 chance and double answer chance. You can use each of them spending golds in single player modes or multiplayer matches.

With our unique World Map, you can learn the locations and country shapes of all countries.

List the flags by levels (according to difficulty) in Study section. You may study all flags and names, capitals, populations, areas or currencies of countries with our functional flashcards at every level.

You can use Country List in Study section. You can sort countries by levels, continents or A to Z.

With our unique Search section, you can search for a country. You may study all flags and names, capitals, populations, areas or currencies of countries.

You can guess the country name from 4 flags or the flag from 4 countries. You can guess the country flag of given capital city name. No confusing mechanics. Simple and modern design.

You will feel like you are competing with yourself. Additionally there is a leaderboard of players around the world. Try more and put your name in Top 100 List.

You will also compete with other players in multiplayer mode. There is a leaderboard of multiplayer players around the world. Try hard and put your name in Multiplayer Top 100 List.

Don’t forget! You will learn all the flags by finishing all the levels with 3 hearts in 2 modes.

With a wide range of languages, learn in your native language or any other desired language.

You can use our fun and educational app “Flags of The World Quiz 2” in 29 different languages: English, Turkish, French, Spanish, Russian, German, Portuguese, Polish, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Indonesian, Danish, Norwegian, Arabic, Czech, Persian, Romanian, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Finnish, Korean, Japanese, Bulgarian, Azerbaijani, Hebrew, Serbian, Georgian, Chinese.

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gedevapps/
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/gedevapps
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gedevapps/
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFPDgs61ls5dCHcGXxzUrqg

title: Flags 2: Geo Quiz

container.value: Merkez Mah. Abide-i Hürriyet Cad. Blackout İş Merkezi No:211/64 Şişli/İstanbul Türkiye

creator: gedev
descriptionHtml:
Flags of the World 2 is a geography quiz game (trivia) that teaches the flags, capitals, maps, continents and currencies of all world countries in the most fun way possible. You will always remember flags, capital cities and all other things you learned with this game. There are two multiplayer modes named Flags and Geo Mix. You can play multiplayer games with people who are from all over the world. You can also play with your friends.

There are 240 country flags and 14 single player quiz types in the game. In every game type you have 15 levels to finish. It gets harder progressively in this flags quiz game

Every level has 20 country flags, 20 capital cities, 20 maps, 20 continents or 20 currencies and you have 20 seconds to match the flag or country/state for each question. If you choose a wrong flag, you will see the name of that flag or country/state.

You will also learn details like populations and areas while guessing a flag or a country/state, every question.

You have a unique progress for each game type and each language in single player modes. Also, there is a leaderboard for each language. Earn XP and be successful in this list.

There are 2 Multiplayer modes: Flags, Geo Mix which includes Countries, Capital Cities, Maps and Continents. You can earn gold and points (P) by winning games.

You can play Multiplayer games and join the tournament. When you are successful in this tournament list, you win in-game prizes and achievements. Tournaments last 48 or 72 hours. When a tournament finishes, a new one starts.

You have gold in the game that you can spend to use lifelines, own avatars and themes and enter challenge modes. When your in-game gold is not enough for those actions, you can earn some gold by playing single player levels or multiplayer matches.

You have two types of lifelines: 50:50 chance and double answer chance. You can use each of them by using gold in single player modes or multiplayer matches.

An interactive world map is one of the key points of learning geography. With our unique world map, you can learn the locations and country shapes of all countries. You can do it by playing single player map quizzes or multiplayer “Geo Mix” quizzes. You may also practice with the world map without joining a quiz.

List the flags by levels according to difficulty in the “Practice” section. You may study all flags and country names, capitals, populations, areas or currencies of the countries with our functional flashcards at every level. You may also use the Country List in the Study section. You can filter or sort countries by levels, continents or alphabetically.

You can guess the country name from 4 flags or the flag from 4 countries. You can guess the country flag of the given capital city name. No confusing mechanics. This geo game has a simple and modern design.

With a wide range of languages, learn in your native language or any other desired language.

Don’t forget! You will learn all the flags by finishing all the levels with 3 hearts in 2 modes.
descriptionShort: Multiplayer flag game. Guess the country with flag, map or capital city!

creator: gedev
descriptionHtml:
Looking for a multiplayer flag quiz game that improves your brain and challenges your IQ? Look no further than Flags 2: Multiplayer! This tricky riddle game is a multiplayer trivia experience that tests your geo knowledge of maps, countries, and continents. With 240 country flags and 14 single-player quiz types, this game will keep you on your toes!

Join a duel with friends or play against opponents from all over the world in the Flags and Geo Mix multiplayer modes. This game will teach you everything you need to know about country flags, capital cities, maps, and currencies, and it's the most fun way to learn!

With 15 levels to finish in every game type, this game gets progressively harder as you advance. Each level has 20 country flags, capital cities, maps, continents, or currencies, and you have just 20 seconds to match the flag or country/state for each question. You'll also learn details like populations and areas while guessing, making this game an excellent way to learn while you play.

Earn XP and climb the leaderboard in single-player modes, and earn gold and points in multiplayer matches. Spend your in-game gold on lifelines, avatars, themes, and challenge modes. Use the 50:50 chance and double answer chance lifelines to boost your chances of winning.

Our interactive world map is a key feature of learning geography. You can learn the locations and shapes of all countries, and practice with the world map without joining a quiz. Study all flags and country names, capitals, populations, areas, or currencies with our functional flashcards at every level.

With a modern design and a wide range of languages to choose from, Flags 2: Multiplayer is the ultimate flags puzzle game that boosts your brain by challenging tests. Don't forget to finish all levels with 3 hearts in 2 modes to learn all the flags!
descriptionShort: Multiplayer flag game. Guess the country with flag, map or capital city!
